mapper.select: SELECT m.email, m.name, m.company_code, m.signup_at, m.status AS member_status, m.dept_code, NVL(d.dept_name, '미정') AS dept_name, m.level_code, NVL(j.level_name, '미정') AS level_name FROM member m LEFT JOIN job_level j ON m.level_code = j.level_code AND m.company_code = j.company_code LEFT JOIN department d ON m.dept_code = d.dept_code AND m.company_code = d.company_code WHERE m.status = '승인' ORDER BY m.signup_at DESC
SELECT company_code FROM job_level WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM job_level ORDER BY level_code DESC
